alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; San Francisco River Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 6:02PM MST until February 23 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, West Central Highlands, San Francisco River Valley, and Estancia Valley. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 7 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; San Francisco River Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; West Central Highlands
